biotools.summary: Scientific tool designed to identify characteristic structures or components in heterogenous solutions from bulk-average data. It does this by evolving a population of ensembles containing candidate components, selecting only ensembles that fit the available experimental data better than their peers.

bioschemas.name: MESMER
